text: Jaroslav Šerých (; 27 February 1928 - 23 March 2014) was a Czech artist. He mainly worked as a painter, printmaker, and illustrator. He was born in Německý Brod, Czechoslovakia (now Havlíčkův Brod, Czech Republic). Šerých died on 23 March 2014 in Prague. He was 86 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jaroslav Šerých works at the ArtBohemia website Category:1928 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Czech artists Category:Czech painters Category:People from Prague
title: Jaroslav Šerých
